publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2303 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Project Ability—That the Parliament recognises the excellent work of Project Ability, Glasgow, in creating opportunities for disabled people to gain access to the visual arts since 1984; further recognises the excellent work undertaken by Project Ability’s Centre for Developmental Arts since 1991 and its innovative workshop programme that supports people with learning disabilities in taking an active part in national and international arts events, and wishes the centre all the very best on its 10th anniversary. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2303 Project Ability (lodged on 4 October 2001) Michael Matheson*, Robin Harper*
S1M-2303 Project Ability (lodged on 4 October 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2303 Project Ability (lodged on 4 October 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2303 Project Ability (lodged on 4 October 2001) Alex Neil*
S1M-2303 Project Ability (lodged on 4 October 2001) Irene McGugan*, Pauline McNeill*
